Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near California/56th
ShortDescription: Northbound 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 59th, Western, 55th, and California, due to, street blockage near California/56th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 59th, Western, 55th, and California, due to, street blockage near California/56th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
